Paragraph: In this regard , a simple and effective method might be to tune the properties of D-A type photovoltaic polymers by introducing thienyl groups as spacers between donor and acceptor segments in the backbone.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Properties of D-A type photovoltaic polymers |

| Donor segments |
| Acceptor segments |

Note: "D-A type photovoltaic polymers" is a type of material, but it is not a property. "Thienyl groups" were specified as spacers, so they are included as a property related to the material.
